Name: Mighty Planes
Title: C2A Greyhound
Desc: The C-2 Greyhound has a unique design; it provides critical logistics support for the U.S. Navy.
LongDescription: The C-2 Greyhound's design allows it a flexibility and access that few other fixed wing craft possess; for the U.S. Navy, it provides critical logistics support, flying 1,000 miles in a matter of hours and transporting high-priority cargo.
